data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Oita do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oita, Japan

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Oita
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Oita, Japan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 6,566 believers in the state of Oita into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Burakumin people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Burakumin people know you.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 6,566 believers in Oita.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Oita, Japan know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary:
the state of Oita, Japan has a population of 1,159,600.

We estimate Oita has 6,566 people who might know Jesus, 18,515 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,134,520 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Oita, Japan humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Oita
location.people_groups_list: Judeo-Japanese, Amami-Oshima, Southern, Eurasian, Kunigami, Turk
